body.p: The boards considered the following questions about the transition requirements in IFRS 15 with respect to a completed contract:

li.p: definition of and accounting for a completed contract.
providing an entity applying paragraph C3(b) of IFRS 15 with the choice of applying IFRS 15 to all contracts including completed contracts at the date of initial application.
permitting an entity applying paragraph C3(a) of IFRS 15 not to restate completed contracts at the beginning of the earliest period presented.
